post.body: I follow @willw too and I just saw this... holy crap how sad -_- My thoughts are with the Roddenberries
I was just thinking about doing the same shortly! xD
haha, I've had that same line go thru my head so many time... yes lotion helps lots!
yay I noez you! xD it's all flakey and sad now... it's molting! LOL SOOOOOOOOO hard not to peel it, but I'm fighting it! LOL
who you stalkin me???? xD Who dis??? What do you know about my she-krets??? lol
That's what I call win - just have to figure out how to sneak some kahlua + vodka into work. Boy, I'd be a happy employee too! xD
that's funny, we follow a lot of the same folks! I was in AIE for a while and it was great but I missed my old buddies from T.
yep, I'm on terenas too... our guild is really small, Knights of Irresolution - my main is Hideto. Small guilds FTW!^^
Hi Ozzy, I think you and I would be good friends! -Kaito K. *chinwoofs+spins*
ha! I see what you did thar...
gratz to diru on Dozing Green making #1 on Headbanger's Ball!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
gratz on 80!! I'm pushing close @ 77 on my belf pally. I've never played ally actually, hit me up in game if you roll horde!
Sumo wax and a Chi flat iron definitely... xD Chewie would be looking hot!
Craaabcaaaaaaaaakes! GIMME!!! 0_____-
GAHHH I'm totally craving limeade now that you said that... I must be really really thirsty!!!!!!! hee hee mornin' lemon!
hope you get the work done soon! i plan to be wowing later tonight too :)
sounds like a great evening! what realm do you play on?
you are the ninjaist of ninjabeeyotches fo sho! xD
holy crap this is awesome... I can always print out at work too!! Let me know if there are any you want xD
I am ADD offa the charts today!!! Total huh? huh? SHINY! crasssh!! lol
What's yummy... Eggnog Milkshakes from McD's that's what!
Crikey... December 15th, 65 degrees and sunny. Is this heaven?
Right now my arm smells like a baby's butt... starting using the A&D ointment today on my fresh tat. Kinda nice but weird! xD
I just got my hide ink... will have a twitpic later!!!!
getting ready for hide birthday fun tonight!!!!!!
Sorry for the tweet spam but I'm also now an officer in my guild! Knights of Irresolution on US: Terenas.
Another week begins.. not a bad start considering Hideto was able to ding 75 last night. xD
Week is over finally.... this wwek was a huge blahfest of blahcrappy blahness!
Having far too much fun w/ my HTC Fuze! Big WoW wknd... will ding 74 tonight and hopefully 75 by Monday! Where is my caffeine IV dammit?!
I really must be getting sick because I truly love the flavor of this orange zest alka seltzer cold medicine! =>^__^<=
re @direngrey Thank you for making the "Dozing Green" music video the #1 video of 2008 on MTV2's Headbangers Ball! http://tinyurl.com/8zpjfb
OMG IT. IS. COLLLLLLLLLLD!!!!!!!!! (but my dreams of u.'s thighs keep me warm lol)
Hard time keeping my mind focused today... I'm still caught up thinking about The Great Happiness Space: Tales of an Osaka Love Thief!
I rescued my ipod, got my ABB & bacon I'd been craving yesterday, and it's a 3 day week... all is SO right with the world! ^_^
GAHHH I left my ipod in my friends car and I'm not sure I'll get it back by tomorrow morning! /facepalm
just got home from a very long but fun day eating and watching good stuff! @humpkin you must try to see The Great Happiness Space!
at a friends place watching paradise kiss and getting ready to go eat lunch!!
for crap's sake it is like a million degress on the bus and at least 40F outside.... this is gonna make me sick dangit.
I have massive cravings for ABB today... it's like Dexter and his cravings but different lol. Don't ask!!!!
It's Friday... that means STARBUCKSDAY! Hellyezzz.. imma go pop! pop! pop! *happydances*
